Package personal.gym.validation

Class ListValidations

java.lang.Object
personal.gym.validation.ListValidations
public class ListValidations
extends java.lang.Object
Data structure holding all the registration validations accumulated.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yu Deng, Philippe Gabriel, Julien Thibeault, Yan Zhuang

  • Method Details

    • setListReceipts

      public void setListReceipts​(ListReceipts listReceipts)
      Parameters:
      listReceipts - ListReceipts reference

    • getValidations

      public java.util.List<Validation> getValidations()
      Returns:
      List of validations

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the validations list from its contents. This method should be called on a weekly basis.

    • createValidation

      public void createValidation​(java.lang.String profNo, java.lang.String memberNo, java.lang.String sessionNo, java.lang.String comment) throws InvalidFormatException
      Creates a validation for a registration to a session indicating that a member has attended the session offered by some professional. Also creates or updates the receipts for the member and professional.
      Parameters:
      profNo - Validation session professional number
      memberNo - Validation session member number
      sessionNo - Validation session number
      comment - Validation comment
      Throws:
      InvalidFormatException - if at least one of the provided attributes does not respect the imposed format

    • isValidationExisting

      public boolean isValidationExisting​(java.lang.String sessionNo)
      Verifies whether a validation exists for a given session.
      Parameters:
      sessionNo - Session number
      Returns:
      true if a validation exists for the given session number, false otherwise
